# terracurl Provider

The TerraCurl provider allows you to make custom HTTP requests in Terraform.

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    terracurl = {
      source  = "devops-rob/terracurl"
      version = "1.0.0"
    }
  }
}

provider "terracurl" {}
```
